page.title: 01The Bryanston Estate
page.content: This block is dominated by the late 19th century{Bryanston House}and its Estate. The house is now a boarding school whose grounds occupy a large part of the original estate. {Farming}is the other main activity besides education . There are 3 separate farms in the block, rented from the Crown,the landlord after tax (death duties)forced the sale of the estate by the Portman family. {Bryanston Village}is divided into The Cliff & Lower Bryanston. Most of the residents depend on one or other of the two activities for a living, though others work in{Blandford}or elsewhere in Dorset. There are few amenities in this area & the majority of the people depend on Blandford for goods and services. For a third of the year the school pupils are on holiday & not in the area.
